Trading App Guide

ðŸ“± Getting Started: Balance Page

When you first log in, you land on the Balance Page (Main Dashboard).

Total Wallet Balance is displayed at the top and updates in real-time.

Below the balance, you'll see a list of assets you currently hold (e.g., Wrapped SOL).

Each asset shows:

  • Current price
  • Amount you hold
  • Daily price change

Wallet Management:

  • Click the wallet icon (top left corner) to:
    • Switch between wallets
    • Add a new wallet
    • Remove an existing wallet

ðŸ”„ How to Swap Tokens

Go to the Swap Page (swap icon at the bottom).

Steps to swap:

  • Select the token you want to sell from your assets.
  • Select the token you want to buy:
    • Choose from a list of available tokens, or
    • Paste the contract address for a custom token.
  • Enter the amount you want to swap.
  • Review all transaction details carefully.
  • Confirm the swap to process the trade on the Solana network.

ðŸ•’ Viewing Transaction History

Access the History Page by tapping the clock icon at the bottom.

The History Page shows:

  • All past transactions
  • Swapped amounts
  • Token pairs
  • Transaction dates

âœ… Pro Tips for Using the App

  • Easily switch, add, or remove wallets from the Balance Page.
  • Double-check token contract addresses when trading lesser-known coins.
  • Monitor gas fees displayed in the top right corner of the Balance Page.
  • Use the History tab to track your trading journey and review past swaps.
